titles.title: To require a briefing on the national security threats associated with Chinese autonomous ground vehicles operating in the United States.
To require a briefing on the national security threats associated with Chinese autonomous ground vehicles operating in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Defense to brief the House and Senate Committees on Armed Services by March 30, 2024, regarding national security threats associated with Chinese autonomous ground vehicles operating in the United States.
